Module kivakit.resource

Package com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileSystemObject
    Base class for all filesystem objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Disk
    Represents a logical disk where folders and files are stored.
    File
    File abstraction that adds integrates files with the KivaKit resource mini-framework and adds a variety of useful methods.
    File.Converter
    Converts to and from File objects
    File.Resolver
    Resolves ResourceIdentifiers that are file paths into file Resources.
    FileCache
    A file cache with the given root.
    FileList
    A list of files with useful methods added.
    FileList.Converter
    Converts to and from FileLists
    Folder
    Folder abstraction that extends FileSystemObject and implements the ResourceFolder interface for filesystems.
    Folder.Converter
    Converts to and from Folders
    Folder.Resolver
    Resolves valid folder paths into ResourceFolders.
    FolderChangeWatcher
    Watches for changes to the contents of a Folder.
    FolderList
    A list of folders with additional useful methods, including: FolderList.asSet() - This list as a set FolderList.matching(Matcher) - The folders in this list that match the given matcher
    FolderList.Converter
    Converts to and from folder lists separated by commas
    FolderPruner
    Removes nested files matching FolderPruner.matcher(Matcher) from the given folder when they meet expiration criteria.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Folder.Traversal
    Type of traversal to perform
    Folder.Type
    Type of folder
